title: Zombie Bundle 02 - Game Assets + Extra
longDescription:
The Second Bundle of Zombie for your game, designed to be versatile for the Modern, Futuristic or Medieval Horror game with three material! Following you can find the list:


3+1 Free, Bundle include:

Zombie 00 - Premium Game Assets with Blend Material: 79.99$ FREE

Zombie 04 - Game Assets + Extra: 14.99$

Zombie 05 - Game Assets + Extra: 14.99$

Zombie 06 - Game Assets + Extra: 14.99$


Have you already purchased at least one Stigma Studios product on UE MarketPlace? Join on Discord and access to a Limited Promo - You can choose one Product for FREE
This is a limited promotion, if you have ever purchased even a single Stigma Studios product in the UE Marketplace, that will allow you to have one character of your choice for FREE! Once you have entered the Discord, check the #welcome channel and follow the instructions! This promo is not cumulative, is valid only once.
Request for custom character? Take a look Here


Following you can find a Detail Overview video, Demonstration Video and tutorial to retarget UE4 animation to Zombie Bundle 02 Characters


Detail Overview Video & How Retarget Animation

How to retarget Unreal Engine 5


This type of assets aims to offer a convenient character and does not reflect the quality of "premium" assets, take a look at how it can render in a composite environment!


Updates are planned for this assets in the future and may increase in price!


Example use for game productions - Game Demo Video *


* "Example use for game productions - Game Demo Video" Only for showcase/example purpose, the package doesn't include any others BP, Character or animation show in this video except for the Zombie Bundle 02 character products.


Join on Discord for:

Limited Promo: Special promotions for all users and loyal users.

Product Support: Receive support for the purchased product.

Update: Track the status of new upcoming production.

Suggestions: Vote the next pack or recommend what you would like see next or future update.


Thanks for the support!


Epic Games Animation is used for display/example only.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  Bundle 3D Characters: 4 Zombie Character 3d model to get a unique design impact for you game.
  •  Versatile Design: Model designed to be used in different artistic contexts and be versatile.


Scaled to Epic skeleton: Yes

Rigged: Yes

Rigged to Epic skeleton: Yes

Animated: Yes ( ONLY Epic Games Default Third Person Animation for Demonstration purpose retarget to Zombie 03)

Number of Main Characters: 4

Vertex counts of Zombie00: 6.347

Tris counts of Zombie00: 11.114

Vertex counts of Zombie04: 10.780

Tris counts of Zombie04: 19.860

Vertex counts of Zombie05: 10.685

Tris counts of Zombie05: 19.131

Vertex counts of Zombie06: 8.640

Tris counts of Zombie06: 16.339



Texture Resolutions: 4096x4096

Number of Animations: 7 (ONLY Epic Games Default Third Person Animation for Demonstration)


ThirdPersonIdle

ThirdPersonWalk

ThirdPersonRun

ThirdPersonJump_Start

ThirdPersonJump_Loop

ThirdPersonJump_End

ThirdPerson_Jump


This animation are Default animation of Epic Games, all rights reserved. Only for Demonstration purpose.

releaseInfo.releaseNote: - Fixed issue with Zombie04 retargeting bone on legs
